updates

⚇ noisy spaces at ucl slade ( November 2025 ) ⚇

I gave a lecture to UCL Slades Art & Technology and Mixed Media BA pathways, looking at noisy spaces, my practice and creative applications of mundane technology. I presented via figma board.


⚇ love rant - wind socks - our ponds - dyke project ( November 2025 ) ⚇

Agnes and I constructed a series of wind socks for the Our Ponds Dyke Project action at Hampstead Heath, with the slogans; Trans / Rights, Learn / Love & Our / Ponds. Additionally, I led a small piece called Love Rant, based on Julia Serano’s essay of the same name.


⚇ Switched-On: Goldberg - Holy Trinity NYC ( October 2025 ) ⚇

Agnes, myself and Austin Philamon performed the Goldberg Variations on a series of synthesisers inspired by the classic Switched-On: Bach by Wendy Carlos at the Holy Trinity Lutheran Chapel on Central Park West and 53rd Street as part of their legendary Bach Vespers programme.
